1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas that:A man came to the Prophet; he had performed ablution and has missed a spot the size of a fingernail where water had not reached. The Prophet said to him: 'Go back and perform ablution properly

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَوَضَّأَ فَتَرَكَ مَوْضِعًا لَمْ يُصِبْهُ الْمَاءُ
chapter.eng-name: One who performed ablution and left a place where water did not reach.
